metadataAttributes.Title: Dynamic Programming, Greedy Algorithms
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course covers basic algorithm design techniques such as divide and conquer, dynamic programming, and greedy algorithms. It concludes with a brief introduction to intractability (NP-completeness) and using linear/integer programming solvers for solving optimization problems. We will also cover some advanced topics in data structures.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Analysis of Algorithms,Algorithm Design,Python Programming,Data Structure Design,Intractability,
